definition: to cast in metal/(fig.) to forge/to fashion
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth

sentences.english: Many of the gold ornaments are melted down to be made into coins.
sentences.chinese: 很多黄金饰物回炉后铸成了金币。

sentences.english: But it is a big mistake to tell too many people where you're heading.
sentences.chinese: 但不能告诉太多人你的方向，否则将铸成大错。

sentences.english: No freedom without sacrifice, endless blood perpetuated convictions of our national dignity. (UTOYXC)
sentences.chinese: 为自由而流的血，铸成永垂不朽的民族尊严。

sentences.english: The statue was cast in bronze.
sentences.chinese: 这座塑像是用青铜铸成的。

sentences.english: His great abilities might have prevented many a blunder at the Fuehrer's headquarters.
sentences.chinese: 他的非凡才能可能使元首大本营避免铸成许多大错。

sentences.english: In ancient times the rulers ran copper or silver into coins.
sentences.chinese: 古时候统治者把铜或银铸成钱币。

sentences.english: The damage has been done, " he warned yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 损害已经铸成”，昨天他警告说。

sentences.english: They have turned away quickly from what I commanded them and have made a cast idol for themselves.
sentences.chinese: 他们快快地偏离了我所吩咐的道，为自己铸成了偶像。

sentences.english: The king had them cast in clay molds in the plain of the Jordan between Succoth and Zarethan.
sentences.chinese: 是在约旦平原疏割和撒利但中间藉胶泥铸成的。

sentences.english: Acceptance of this view would end up in gross errors.
sentences.chinese: 接受这种观点就会铸成大错。

sentences.english: Safety valve can be covered with the body or pump Zhucheng one, can also be a separate assembly.
sentences.chinese: 安全阀可以与泵体或泵盖铸成一体，也可以单独装配。

sentences.english: These ancient weapons are all cast out of bronze.
sentences.chinese: 这些古兵器都是用青铜铸成的。

sentences.english: The church bell is made of bronze.
sentences.chinese: 教堂的钟是由青铜铸成的？

sentences.english: There is a statue cast in bronze.
sentences.chinese: 那里有一具青铜铸成的像。

sentences.english: It was wrought out of red bronze, and carved with sea-dragons and dragons that have wings.
sentences.chinese: 城门用红铜铸成，雕着海龙和飞龙。

sentences.english: Best suited to make a cut off plastic injection molding products and removal of the foot edge.
sentences.chinese: 最适合于切断塑料铸成品的注塑口以及边脚料的去除。

definition: to cast (pour metal into a mold)
bronze (alloy of copper 銅|铜 and tin 錫|锡[xi1])
brass (alloy of copper 銅|铜[tong2] and zinc 鋅|锌[xin1])
copper (pure copper, as opposed to alloy)
copper (chemistry)/see also 紅銅|红铜[hong2 tong2]/CL:塊|块[kuai4]
